original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 1.19. Atītattika
analyzed: atītattika

original: Vibhaṅgavāra
analyzed: vibhaṅgavāra

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—paccuppannā hetū
analyzed: paccuppannaḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccaya upaccuppannāḥ hetū

original: sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
analyzed: sampayuttakānam khandhānam citta samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānam hetu paccayena paccayaḥ paṭisandhi khaṇe pe

original: Ārammaṇa
analyzed: ārammaṇa

original: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ
analyzed: atītaḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayodānam da tvā

original: samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ …pe… paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā
analyzed: samādiyitvā uposatha kammam pe paccavekkhati pubbe su ciṇṇāni paccavekkhati jhānā

original: vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ paccavekkhati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti,
analyzed: vuṭṭhahitvā jhānam paccavekkhati ariyāḥ maggāḥ vuṭṭhahitvā maggam paccavekkhanti

original: phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti,
analyzed: phalam paccavekkhanti pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti

original: pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti. Atītaṁ cakkhuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati
analyzed: pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti atītam cakkhum aniccataḥ dukkhataḥ anattataḥ vipassati

original: …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Atītaṁ sotaṁ …pe… ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde
analyzed: pe domanassam uppajjati atītam sotam pe ghānam jivham kāyam rūpe sadde

original: … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … atīte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato
analyzed: gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe vatthum atīte khandhe aniccataḥ dukkhataḥ anattataḥ

original: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā
analyzed: vipassati assādeti abhinandati tam ārabbha rāgaḥ uppajjati diṭṭhi uppajjati vicikicchā

original: … uddhaccaṁ … domanassaṁ uppajjati, ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: uddhaccam domanassam uppajjati ākāsānañcāyatanam viññāṇañcāyatanassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. Ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Atītā
analyzed: paccayaḥ ākiñcañña āyatanam nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ atītā

original: khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa,
analyzed: khandhāḥ iddhividha ñāṇassa cetas upariya ñāṇassa pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇassa yathā kammūpaga ñāṇassa

original: āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: āvajjanāya ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—anāgataṁ cakkhuṁ
analyzed: anāgataḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ anāgatam cakkhu

original: …pe… vatthuṁ … anāgate khandhe aniccato …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Anāgatā khandhā
analyzed: pe vatthum anāgate khandhe aniccatas pe domanassam uppajjati anāgatā khandhā

original: iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: iddhividha ñāṇassa cetopariya ñāṇassa anāgata sañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇa paccayena paccayo

original: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— paccuppannaṁ
analyzed: paccuppannaḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ paccuppanna

original: cakkhuṁ …pe… kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … paccuppanne
analyzed: cakkhum pe kāyam rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe vatthum paccuppanne

original: khandhe aniccato …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya
analyzed: khandhe aniccato pe domanassam uppajjati dibbena cakkhunā rūpam passati dibbāya

original: sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa
analyzed: sota dhātuyā saddam suṇāti rūpa āyatanam cakkhu viññāṇassa pe phoṭṭhabba āyatanam kāya viññāṇassa

original: …pe… paccuppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: pe paccuppannā khandhāḥ iddhividha ñāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇa paccayena paccayo

original: Adhipati
analyzed: adhipati

original: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—dānaṁ
analyzed: atītaḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipati paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇa adhipati dāna

original: datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā …pe… pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā
analyzed: datvā sīlam samādiyitvā pe pubbe su ciṇṇāni garum katvā paccavekkhati jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā

original: jhānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti,
analyzed: jhānam garum katvā paccavekkhati ariyāḥ maggāḥ vuṭṭhahitvā maggam garum katvā paccavekkhanti

original: phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti. Atītaṁ cakkhuṁ …pe… kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe
analyzed: phalam garum katvā paccavekkhanti atītam cakkhum pe kāyam rūpe sadde gandhe

original: … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … atīte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ
analyzed: rase phoṭṭhabbe vatthum atīte khandhe garum katvā assādeti abhinandati

original: garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
analyzed: garum katvā rāgaḥ uppajjati diṭṭhi uppajjati

original: Anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—anāgataṁ
analyzed: anāgataḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipati paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇa ādhipati anāgata

original: cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ … anāgate khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ
analyzed: cakkhum pe vatthum anāgate khandhe garum katvā assādeti abhinandati tam garu

original: katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
analyzed: katvā rāgaḥ uppajjati diṭṭhi uppajjati

original: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
analyzed: paccuppannaḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipati paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇa adhipati

original: sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati—paccuppannaṁ cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ … paccuppanne
analyzed: sahajāta adhipati ārammaṇa adhipati paccuppannam cakkhum pe vatthum paccuppanne

original: khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi
analyzed: khandhe garum katvā assādeti abhinandati tam garum katvā rāgaḥ uppajjati diṭṭhi

original: uppajjati. Sahajātādhipati—paccuppannādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca
analyzed: uppajjati sahajāta adhipati paccuppanna adhipati sampayuttakānam khandhānam citta samuṭṭhānānam ca

original: rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: rūpānam adhipati paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Anantara
analyzed: anantara

original: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā atītā
analyzed: atītaḥ dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantara paccayena paccayo purimā purimā atītā

original: khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ paccuppannānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: khandhāḥ pacchimānam pacchimānam paccuppannānam khandhānam anantara paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa … gotrabhu maggassa … vodānaṁ maggassa
analyzed: anulomam gotrabhussa anulomam vodānassa gotrabhu maggassa vodānam maggassa

original: … maggo phalassa … phalaṁ phalassa … anulomaṁ phalasamāpattiyā … nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa
analyzed: maggaḥ phalassa phalam phalassa anulomam phala samāpattiyāḥ nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa

original: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam phala samāpattiyāḥ anantara paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Samanantara
analyzed: samanantara

original: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo. (Anantarasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: atītaḥ dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa samanantara paccayena paccayaḥ anantara sadisa

original: Sahajātādi
analyzed: sahajāta ādi

original: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paccuppannaḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa sahajāta paccayena paccayaḥ aññamañña paccayena paccayaḥ nissaya paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Upanissaya
analyzed: upanissaya

original: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
analyzed: atītaḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇa upanissayo

original: anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe…. Pakatūpanissayo—atītaṁ saddhaṁ upanissāya
analyzed: anantara upanissayaḥ pakata upanissayaḥ pe pakata upanissayaḥ atītam saddham upanissāya

original: dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti, jhānaṁ uppādeti, vipassanaṁ
analyzed: dānam deti sīlam samādiyati uposatha kammam karoti jhānam uppādeti vipassana

original: … maggaṁ … abhiññaṁ … samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti. Atītaṁ
analyzed: maggam abhiññam samāpattim uppādeti mānam jappeti diṭṭhim gaṇhāti atīta

original: sīlaṁ …pe… paññaṁ … rāgaṁ …pe… patthanaṁ … kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ … kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ upanissāya
analyzed: sīlam pe paññam rāgam pe patthanam kāyikam sukham kāyikam dukkham upanissāya

original: dānaṁ deti sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, pāṇaṁ hanati
analyzed: dānam deti sīlam samādiyati uposatha kammam pe samāpattim uppādeti pāṇam hanati

original: …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati. Atītā saddhā …pe… paññā, rāgo …pe… patthanā, kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ
analyzed: pe saṅgham bhindati atītā saddhā pe paññā rāgaḥ pe patthanā kāyikam sukha

original: … kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ … paccuppannāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya, rāgassa …pe… patthanāya
analyzed: kāyikam dukkham paccuppannāya saddhāya pe paññāya rāgassa pe patthanāya

original: …pe… phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: pe phala samāpattiyāḥ upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
analyzed: anāgataḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇa upanissayo

original: pakatūpanissayo …pe…. Pakatūpanissayo—anāgataṁ cakkhusampadaṁ patthayamāno …pe… sotasampadaṁ
analyzed: pakata upanissayaḥ pe pakata upanissayaḥ anāgatam cakkhu sampadam patthayamāno pe sota sampada

original: … ghānasampadaṁ jivhāsampadaṁ … kāyasampadaṁ … vaṇṇasampadaṁ … saddasampadaṁ … gandhasampadaṁ
analyzed: ghāna sampadam jivhā sampadam kāya sampadam vaṇṇa sampadam sadda sampadam gandha sampadam

original: … rasasampadaṁ … phoṭṭhabbasampadaṁ … patthayamāno …pe… anāgate khandhe patthayamāno
analyzed: rasa sampadam phoṭṭhabba sampadam patthayamāno pe anāgate khandhe patthayamāno

original: dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ … anāgatā cakkhusampadā …pe… vaṇṇasampadā
analyzed: dānam deti sīlam samādiyati uposatha kammaṃ anāgatā cakkhu sampadā pe vaṇṇa sampadā

original: …pe… phoṭṭhabbasampadā … anāgatā khandhā paccuppannāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya, kāyikassa
analyzed: pe phoṭṭhabba sampadā anāgatāḥ khandhāḥ paccuppannāya saddhāya pe paññāya kāyikassa

original: sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: sukhassa kāyikassa dukkhassa maggassa phala samāpattiyāḥ upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
analyzed: paccuppannaḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇa upanissayaḥ

original: pakatūpanissayo …pe…. Pakatūpanissayo—paccuppannaṁ utuṁ upanissāya jhānaṁ uppādeti,
analyzed: pakatu upanissayaḥ pe pakatu upanissaya upaccuppannam utum upanissāya jhānam uppādeti

original: vipassanaṁ …pe… paccuppannaṁ bhojanaṁ senāsanaṁ upanissāya jhānaṁ uppādeti …pe… samāpattiṁ
analyzed: vipassanam pe paccuppannam bhojanam senāsanam upanissāya jhānam uppādeti pe samāpatti

original: uppādeti. Paccuppannaṁ utu … bhojanaṁ … senāsanaṁ paccuppannāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya
analyzed: uppādeti paccuppannam utu bhojanam senāsanam paccuppannāya saddhāya pe paññāya

original: kāyikassa …pe… phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: kāyikassa pe phala samāpattiyāḥ upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Purejāta
analyzed: purā jāta

original: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
analyzed: paccuppannaḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇa purejāta

original: vatthupurejātaṁ. Ārammaṇapurejātaṁ—cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ aniccato …pe… domanassaṁ
analyzed: vatthu purejāta ārammaṇa purejāta cakkhum pe vatthum aniccato pe domanassa

original: uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ
analyzed: uppajjati dibbena cakkhunā rūpam passati dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddam suṇāti rūpa āyatana

original: cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇassa pe phoṭṭhabba āyatanam kāya viññāṇassa purejāta paccayena paccayo

original: Vatthupurejātaṁ—cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa …
analyzed: vatthu purejāta cakkha āyatanam cakkhu viññāṇassa pe kāya āyatanam kāya viññāṇassa

original: vatthu paccuppannānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: vatthu paccuppannānam khandhānam purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Pacchājāta
analyzed: pacchājāta

original: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo— pacchājātā paccuppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: paccuppannaḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa pacchājāta paccayena paccayaḥ pacchājātāḥ paccuppannāḥ khandhāḥ purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājāta paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Āsevana
analyzed: āsevana

original: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā atītā
analyzed: atītaḥ dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa āsevana paccayena paccayaḥ purimā purimā atītā

original: khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ paccuppannānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: khandhā pacchimānam pacchimānam paccuppannānam khandhānam āsevana paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa … gotrabhu maggassa … vodānaṁ maggassa
analyzed: anulomam gotrabhussa anulomam vodānassa gotrabhu maggassa vodānam maggassa

original: āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: āsevana paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Kamma
analyzed: kamma

original: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākkhaṇikā—atītā cetanā paccuppannānaṁ vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: atītaḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa kamma paccayena paccayaḥ nānākkhaṇikā aatītā cetanā paccuppannānam vipākānam khandhānam kaṭattā ca rūpānam kamma paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— paccuppannā cetanā
analyzed: paccuppannaḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa kamma paccayena paccayaḥ paccuppannā cetanā

original: sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
analyzed: sampayuttakānam khandhānam citta samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānam kamma paccayena paccayaḥ paṭisandhi kkhaṇe

original: paccuppannā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: paccuppannā cetanā sampayuttakānam khandhānam kaṭattā ca rūpānam kamma paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Vipāka
analyzed: vipāka

original: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko paccuppanno
analyzed: paccuppannaḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa vipāka paccayena paccayaḥ vipākaḥ paccuppannaḥ

original: eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo
analyzed: ekaḥ khandhaḥ tiṇṇannam khandhānam citta samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānam vipāka paccayena paccayaḥ

original: …pe… dve khandhā …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… khandhā vatthussa vipākapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: pe dve khandhā pe paṭisandhikkhaṇe pe khandhā vatthussa vipāka paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Āhārādi
analyzed: āhāra ādi

original: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena
analyzed: paccuppannaḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa āhāra paccayena paccayaḥ indriya paccayena

original: paccayo … jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo
analyzed: paccayaḥ jhāna paccayena paccayaḥ magga paccayena paccayaḥ sampayutta paccayena paccayaḥ

original: … vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. Sahajātā—paccuppannā

analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇassa pe kāya āyatanam kāya viññāṇassa vatthu paccuppannānam khandhānaṃ

original: vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—paccuppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa
analyzed: vippayutta paccayena paccayaḥ pacchājātā apaccuppannāḥ khandhāḥ purejātassa imassa kāyassa

original: vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: vippayutta paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Atthi
analyzed: atthi

analyzed: paccanīya uddhāra
